entry.title: [Octopress] Contributing to an existing Octopress blog
entry.content: How to contribute to an existing Octopress blog? Or how to update your own Octopress blog from a new computer? bash git clone git@github.com:username/username.github.com.git cd username.github.com git checkout source mkdir _deploy cd _deploy git init git remote add origin git@github.com:username/username.github.com.git git pull origin master cd ..
